source: Bineînțeles, prin concursuri, căci în sectorul bugetar le câștigă adesea „cine trebuie”, după vechiul sistem PCR - Pile, Cunoștințe, Relații.
target: Of course, through competitions, because in the public sector, they are often won by "the right people," according to the old PCR system - Connections, Acquaintances, Relationships.
